segments.text: Are we going to have gym class tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes I forget that we don't have school on Saturdays .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Americans also don't go to work on Saturdays .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So there are only five working days in a week ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . What are you going to do tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I need to polish up my English .
segments.speaker: S1
